AddAppointment - Class in controller
Controls the AddAppointment screen
AddAppointment() - Constructor for class controller.AddAppointment
 
addAppointmentOnClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainConsole
Controls the click action for the appointment add button loads the add appointment screen
AddCustomer - Class in controller
Controls the AddCustomer screen
AddCustomer() - Constructor for class controller.AddCustomer
 
addCustomerOnClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainConsole
Controls the click action for the add customer button Loads the add customer screen when clicked
allAppointmentsSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainConsole
Controls the click action for the all appointments radio button Displays all appointments from the database in the appointments table
allFieldsFilled() - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
Checks if all fields are filled on the screen Used to successfully add a new appointment(appointment can't be added if a field is empty)
allFieldsFilled() - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
Checks if all fields are filled Customer can't be added if any fields are empty
allFieldsFilled() - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
Checks if all fields are filled Appointment cannot be updated if all fields are not filled
allFieldsFilled() - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
Checks if all fields are filled Customer cannot be updated if all fields aren't filled
Appointment - Class in model
Creates an appointment
Appointment(int, String, String, String, String, int, int, String, int, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructor variable for each appointment
appointmentOverlap() - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
Checks if the new appointment times overlap with an existing appointment Based on conflicting start/end times for other appointments
appointmentOverlap() - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
Checks if the appointment dates/times overlap with an existing appointment Based on conflicting start/end times with other appointments
appointmentSoon() - Method in class controller.Login
Checks if an appointment starts within the next 15 mins Compares the appointment start time with the local machine's time to determine this
appointmentUpcoming(int) - Method in class controller.Login
Grabs the appointment id if an appointment starts within the next 15 mins
